game.name: Abandon Ship
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: '항해의 시대'호의 선장이되어 선원들을 지휘하고, 내 결정에 따라 반응하는 방대한 스토리로 이루어진 세계를 탐험하세요. 고전적인 유화 스타일로 꾸며진 바다에서 적의 함선, 요새 및 바다 몬스터와 잔혹한 전술 전투를 벌이세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take command of an 'Age of Sail' ship and her crew, exploring a vast, story-filled world that reacts to your decisions. Engage enemy vessels, fortifications and sea monsters in brutal tactical combat, all framed in an art style inspired by classic Naval Oil Paintings.
